name: Iron.Router
tagline: A router that works on the server and the browser, designed specifically for Meteor.
body:
# Iron.Router

A router that works on the server and the browser, designed specifically for [Meteor](https://github.com/meteor/meteor).

- [Layouts](#layouts)
- [Route Controllers](#route-controllers)
  - [Route Controller Lookup](#route-controller-lookup)
  - [Custom Action Functions](#custom-action-functions)
  - [wait and waitOn](#wait-and-waiton)
  - [Hooks](#hooks)
- [Plugins](#plugins)
- [Middleware](#middleware)

  - [Server Middleware and Connect](#server-middleware-and-connect)
- [Navigation](#navigation)
  - [Template Helpers](#template-helpers)
  - [Router.go](#router-go)
